title: About
text: I’m Edward Watson, a mathematics student at the ANU with a passion for modelling and statistics, and most importantly AFL. Holy Grail Ratings is a project of mine to model AFL margins, in my opinion Models are about expressing a well quantified opinion about what leads to margins, in my case I run an offensive and defensive ELO system based on scoring shots and expected score.

title: Testing

title: Holy Grail Ratings
text:
title: “Welcome” date: “2025-04-30” categories: [Footy] description: “An introduction to the model” image: “Test.png”


Welcome to Holy Grail Ratings. This is a project of mine to try and model AFL margins as best as possible. There’s a long roadmap for this project which I’ll discuss at the end of the post. But for now I think its best to explain how the model currently works and why I’ve made particular choices, and how to interpret the dashboards on the homepage.
Welcome to Holy Grail Ratings!
